# GKTurnTimeoutDefault

**Global Variable**

A one-week time limit to take a turn.

## Declaration

```swift
var GKTurnTimeoutDefault: TimeInterval
```

## Timeouts

- **GKTurnTimeoutNone**: No timeout to take a turn.

items.description: No timeout to take a turn.
